name: Autonomous
description:
This game is about a friendly robot named Rob which gets tricked into destroying the world. He gets stuck in a cave and finds a mysterious structure which is controlled by an evil AI. The AI makes him do something really bad. Rob doesn't realise it until it's too late and the damage has been already done. 

Make sure to play it till the end (it's not too long) and tell me if you like it.

Play in fullscreen mode for a better experience

Heve fun! 😄
